iti106:0.3: The Chapter on the Holy Offering of the Teaching
iti106:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti106:2.1: “Mendicants, a family where the children honor their parents in their home is said to live with Brahmā.
iti106:2.2: A family where the children honor their parents in their home is said to live with the old deities.
